resources.string: This permission is required for and used only for applying Screen Lock from Yantra Launcher.
Auto Execute command when Secondary Suggestion is Selected
Enter a prefix for your username. This will be displayed before your username in the terminal.
Enter a command to be executed when you double tap the terminal.
Enter a command to be executed when you swipe right on the terminal.
Enter a command to be executed when you swipe left on the terminal.
Enter a website URL to be opened when you enter the \"news\" command.
Enter a font size for the terminal:
Enter a size for the terminal Arrow Keys:
Enter the path to the directory where the Termux command is located.
Enter the path to the directory where the Termux command will be executed.
Enter integer for Termux Session Action. Available : 0,1,2,3. See TermuxConstants.java on GitHub for more info.
Enter your AI provider\'s domain for use in the \'ai\' command. Do not provide the entire URL, just the domain is required (For example: api.openai.com
AI API Provider updated! Make sure you use the corresponding API Key
Enter your API Key for use in the \'ai\' command, corresponding to your AI provider.
Enter The \'system\' prompt for use in the \'ai\' command. It dictates the behaviour of the model.
An error occurred. Please try again.

You need to purchase Font Pack to access this setting.

Font Pack is an add-on for Yantra Launcher that lets you use any font from the entire collection of Google Fonts of more than 1550 fonts for your Yantra Launcher Terminal.

You can purchase Font Pack using the 'fontpack' command.
Error Downloading Font! Please check you internet connection and try again.
echo Right Swipe detected! You can change the command in settings.
echo Left Swipe detected! You can change the command in settings.
An error occurred while fetching apps list
" Contacts not yet fetched! Use 'list contacts' command to fetch contacts first to get suggestions. "
Contact name not found! Attempting to parse as phone number...
Multiple Phone numbers with the name `%1$s` were found. Which one do you want to call?
A new version of Yantra Launcher is available on the Play Store.
If you like this app, please consider rating it and giving a feedback. You can also request features or report bugs. It helps me in improving the app. Thanks :)

Join the community to get the latest updates about Yantra Launcher, ask questions, get help, discuss new features, and more!\n\nEveryone out there are CLI enthusiastsüòé like you, so join the community and have fun!
Sorry, Yantra Launcher seems to have crashed! Please send a report to the developer to help debug the crash. Pressing Ok will take yo to your email client.
You can add an optional comment here to describe the crash:

A simple tool to access chatGPT from the terminal. Based on OpenAI\'s gpt-3.5-turbo, you can chat with your own AI assistant. An API key is required to be entered in \'settings\'. This command does not remember context, so the model will be unaware of your previous conversation.
Please specify the message to send to AI.
You probably forgot to provide an API key. Please enter it in \'settings\'.
No reply found in the response
The server did not send a chat reply! Try again.
I lost my patience! Try again or try a request with a shorter expected output.
Authentication Failed. Make sure you used the correct API key in \'settings\'

Sets alarm using a supported Alarm Clock on your device. Use without args to open the list of alarms on your device default app. The time must be in 24 hr format. It can optionally be followed by a message string to display in alarm.
Examples:
'alarm 14:30' sets alarm for 2:30 pm
'alarm 0:15 Wish good night to ***' sets alarm for 12:15 am with a message to display.
No time provided. Launching alarm app.
Invalid time string provided. It must confront to hh:mm format and must be in 24 hr representation.
No supported alarm app found on your device.

Unix-like aliasing system to set short-hand commands for available commands. Note that Yantra Launcher saves all aliases in memory and is retained even after restarting the Launcher session. Pre-defined commands can not be aliased.
Usage (to set or update an alias): 'alias alias_name = alias_cmd'
Example: 'alias h = help'
Use 'alias alias_name' to get value of the alias. Use 'alias' to get list of all current aliases. Use 'alias -1' to reset to default aliases.
Invalid command. Use \'alias\' to get list of aliases.
Invalid command. See \'help alias\' for usage info
Alias name cannot be an existing command name.
Alias name must contain only alphanumeric characters and must start with a letter
Shows current Battery Level. Use the optional \'-bar\' argument to show just the battery percentage and charging status in visual form.
Invalid args provided. See \"help battery\" for usage info

\'bg\' is used to set custom Wallpaper from the Albums. Use \'bg -1\' to remove custom Wallpaper and set to solid theme background. Use \'bg random\' to fetch a random Wallpaper from the Internet. An optional [query] can be specified with the random command, like \'bg random mountains\' or \'bg random texture,dark\' to fetch related Wallpaper. Note that this command only changes the Home screen wallpaper, not the Lock screen one.
Too many arguments. Use \'bg -1\' to remove custom Wallpaper
Too many arguments. Use \',\' to separate topics like \'bg random city,night-life\'
Toggles bluetooth on/off. Example: \'bluetooth on\' or \'bt 0\'
Please specify a state for bluetooth
Toggle state not recognized. Try using \'on\' | \'off\' or 0 | 1.
This feature requires Android 6 or higher
Helps you find things to do when you\'re bored! (using Bored API)
\'bored\' command does not take any parameters

An in-built calculator to evaluate arithmetic expressions. It does addition, subtraction, multiplication, division, exponentiation (using the ^ symbol), and a few basic functions like sqrt, sin, cos and tan. It supports grouping using (...), and it gets the operator precedence and associativity rules correct.\n\nExample: \'calc ((4 - 2^3 + 1) * -sqrt(3*3+4*4)) / 2\' gives 7.5
Please specify an expression to evaluate.
Calls specified contact name. If contact name is not found then the raw input (considered as phone number) is called.
Please specify a contact name or phone number to call
Changes the current directory to the specified path.\nExample: \'cd DCIM\'
\'clear\' command does not take any parameters.

In case you want any new commands to be added to Yantra Launcher, run this command to open email template for command request. Note that it is not guaranteed that the command request will be accepted but I\'ll try my best to see if I could accommodate it in the upcoming versions of Yantra Launcher, if suitable.
\'cmdrequest\' command does not take any parameters.
Could not launch an email app. Please send the mail to coderGtm@gmail.com with title \'Command request for Yantra Launcher\'
Redirects the Discord server of Yantra Launcher. Here you can share and get Feedback, Suggestions, Insights, tips and CLI emotions from other users like you!
\'community\' command does not take any parameters.
Search for the meaning of a word in an online dictionary (freeDictionaryAPI)
Please specify the word to search for.
No internet connection! This command relies on an online Dictionary API, so an internet connection is required to access it.

Prints specified text to the terminal with the given mode. Here mode is an optional argument (e: Error text, s: Success text, w: Warning text) representing the nature of the text output. If mode is not specified, the text is printed (normal)ly
Examples:
'echo -e An error occurred.'
'echo Hello, World'
Invalid Syntax. See \'help echo\' for usage info.
Launches email app with recipient set. Example: \'email coderGtm@gmail.com\'
Could not launch an email app.
Sorry pal, we couldn\'t find definitions for the word you were looking for.
Exit Launcher. Note: Launcher will restart if set as default Launcher
\'exit\' command does not take any parameters.
